Package hotelsystem.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BillPaymentController
    Description of Bill Payment Controller Add Bill payment to database Able to store and load data from database
    CheckInCheckOutController
    Description of Check In Check Out Controller Retrieve check in and check out details with various methods by loading data from database Save check in details by storing data to database
    DatabaseController
    Description of DatabaseManager A manager to manage database for writing and reading the database.
    FoodController
    Description of Food Controller Saving and loading of new Food Menu into Database
    GuestController
    Description of Check In Check Out Controller To display, saving and loading of guest details to the Database able to load and store data from database
    PromoController
    Description of Promo Controller To store, retrieve and delete promotions
    ReservationController
    Description of Reservation Controller Controls and manages the flow of Reservations Displaying, storing and loading of Reservation List to the Database
    RoomController
    Description of Room Controller Saving and loading of Rooms to the Database
    RoomServiceController
    Description of Room Service Controller Control Room Service order List Storing and loading Room Service order List to the Database
    RoomStatusController
    Description of Room Status Controller Controls individual Room Status To display, saving, loading of Room Status List to the Database
    RoomTypeController
    Description of Room Type Controller Manages the Room Type and to save and load Room Type List to the Database
